properties.displayName: Malicious DLL File Dropped in the Teams or OneDrive Folder
properties.query:
DeviceFileEvents
| where FolderPath contains "iphlpapi.dll" and FolderPath contains "\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft"

tags.name: description
tags.value:
Detects creation of a malicious DLL file in the location where the OneDrive or Team applications
Upon execution of the Teams or OneDrive application, the dropped malicious DLL file ("iphlpapi.dll") is sideloaded
